history.proof: intros A R H l. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type R : Rel A H : GRBar A R nil l : list A Unable to unify "GRBar A R nil" with "GRBar A R l".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A), GRBar A R nil -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l

Premises:
GRBar : forall A : Type, Rel A -> list A -> Type
Rel = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments Rel _%type_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
consGRBar : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (l : list A), GRBar A R l -> forall a : A, GRBar A R (a :: l)
subRelGRBar : forall (A B : Type) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> (forall b : B, {a : A | b = f a}) -> forall l : list A, GRBar A R l -> GRBar B S (map f l)
subRelGoodR : forall (A B : Type) (R : Rel A) (S : Rel B) (f : A -> B), (forall a b : A, R a b -> S (f a) (f b)) -> forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> GoodR B S (map f l)
ForallOrdPairs_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
ForallOrdPairs_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, ForallOrdPairs R l -> P l
SearchG : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), GoodR A R l -> GoodR A R (a :: l)
GoodR_rec : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Set), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
GoodR_rect : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (P : forall l : list A, GoodR A R l -> Type), (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (e : ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l), P (a :: l) (FoundG A R a l e)) -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g -> P (a :: l) (SearchG A R a l g)) -> forall (l : list A) (g : GoodR A R l), P l g
FoundG : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l -> GoodR A R (a :: l)
monGoodR1 : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (xs bs : list A), GoodR A R bs -> GoodR A R (xs ++ bs)
Inductive GoodR (A : Type) (R : Rel A) : list A -> Type := FoundG : forall (a : A) (l : list A), ExistsL A (fun x : A => R x a) l -> GoodR A R (a :: l) | SearchG : forall (a : A) (l : list A), GoodR A R l -> GoodR A R (a :: l) Arguments GoodR _%type_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments FoundG _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments SearchG _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope
monGoodR : forall (A : Type) (R : Rel A) (xs bs cs : list A), GoodR A R (xs ++ bs) -> GoodR A R (xs ++ cs ++ bs)
Forall2_ind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
Forall2_sind : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) (P : list A -> list B -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (y :: l')) -> forall (l : list A) (l0 : list B), Forall2 R l l0 -> P l l0
Inductive ForallOrdPairs (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := FOP_nil : ForallOrdPairs R nil | FOP_cons : forall (a : A) (l : list A), Forall (R a) l -> ForallOrdPairs R l -> ForallOrdPairs R (a :: l) Arguments ForallOrdPairs [A]%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments FOP_nil [A]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments FOP_cons [A]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ [l]%list_scope
rev_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (l ++ x :: nil)) -> forall l : list A, P l
Forall_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (Q : list A -> Type), Q nil -> (forall (b : A) (l : list A), P b -> Q (b :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> Q l
NoDup_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
NoDup_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> SProp), P nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), ~ In x l -> NoDup l -> P l -> P (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, NoDup l -> P l
Forall_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> Prop), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
Forall_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : list A -> SProp), P0 nil -> (forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> Forall P l -> P0 l -> P0 (x :: l)) -> forall l : list A, Forall P l -> P0 l
Bar_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type) (P0 : forall l : list A, Bar A P l -> Type), (forall (l : list A) (p : P l), P0 l (Base A P l p)) -> (forall (l : list A) (b : forall a : A, Bar A P (a :: l)), (forall a : A, P0 (a :: l) (b a)) -> P0 l (Ind A P l b)) -> forall (l : list A) (b : Bar A P l), P0 l b
rev_list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P (rev l) -> P (rev (a :: l))) -> forall l : list A, P (rev l)
Inductive Bar (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type) : list A -> Type := Base : forall l : list A, P l -> Bar A P l | Ind : forall l : list A, (forall a : A, Bar A P (a :: l)) -> Bar A P l Arguments Bar _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Base _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope Arguments Ind _%type_scope _%function_scope _%list_scope _%function_scope
Inductive Forall2 (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop) : list A -> list B -> Prop := Forall2_nil : Forall2 R nil nil | Forall2_cons : forall (x : A) (y : B) (l : list A) (l' : list B), R x y -> Forall2 R l l' -> Forall2 R (x :: l) (y :: l') Arguments Forall2 [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Forall2_nil [A B]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments Forall2_cons [A B]%type_scope [R]%function_scope _ _ [l l']%list_scope
Ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type) (l : list A), (forall a : A, Bar A P (a :: l)) -> Bar A P l
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
FOP_nil : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), ForallOrdPairs R nil
Forall2_nil : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), Forall2 R nil nil
Forall2_refl : forall (A B : Type) (R : A -> B -> Prop), Forall2 R nil nil
map_eq_nil : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = nil -> l = nil
Setoid.Build_Setoid_Theory : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A), RelationClasses.Reflexive R -> RelationClasses.Symmetric R -> RelationClasses.Transitive R -> RelationClasses.Equivalence R
subPredExistsL : forall (A B : Type) (P : Pred A) (S : Pred B) (f : A -> B), (forall a : A, P a -> S (f a)) -> forall l : list A, ExistsL A P l -> ExistsL B S (map f l)
Base : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type) (l : list A), P l -> Bar A P l
count_occ_inv_nil : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), (forall x : A, count_occ eq_dec l x = 0) < -> l = nil
exists_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l <> nil -> {l' : list A & {a : A | l = l' ++ a :: nil}}
Forall_dec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), (forall x : A, {P x} + {~ P x}) -> forall l : list A, {Forall P l} + {~ Forall P l}
```intros A R H l. exact H.```

original: intros A R H l. apply H.
